sentences.sentence: I felt exalted and newly alive.
sentences.translation: 我感到兴高采烈，充满新的活力。

sentences.sentence: The newly discovered world followed an orbital path unlike that of any other planet.
sentences.translation: 新发现的这个天体的运行轨和任何其他行星的不同。

sentences.sentence: A newly married couple will go shopping.
sentences.translation: 一对新婚夫妇会去购物。
